oracle.mapviewer.share.mapcache
Class MapSourceAdapter

java.lang.Object
  oracle.mapviewer.share.mapcache.MapSourceAdapter

public abstract class MapSourceAdapter
extends java.lang.Object

This is the abstract class that represents an external map source adapter. A user defined map source adapter class must extend this class and implement two methods, getName and getMapTileRequest.

MapSourceAdapter

Method Detail

getMapTileRequest

public abstract java.lang.String getMapTileRequest(TileDefinition tile)
Constructs the tile image http request string that will be used to fetch the tile image from the external map service provider. The request string will be send to the map service provider URL defined in the map cache instance XML configuration tring.

Parameters:
tile - the TileDefinition object that describes the map tile to be fetched.
Returns:
http map image request string.

getTileImageBytes

public byte[] getTileImageBytes(TileDefinition tile)
                         throws java.lang.Exception
Fetches the map image tile from the external map service provider by sending the HTTP map tile request to the map service provider, and return the binary tile image data. You can rewrite this method so that the adapter can fetch the tile from an external map service provider that does not accept HTTP requests at all.

Parameters:
tile - the tile definition
Returns:
the binary tile image data.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

props - adapter specific parameters.

setHTTPMethod

public void setHTTPMethod(java.lang.String method)
Sets the HTTP request method. The method is defined in the map cache instance configuration XML string.

Parameters:
method - HTTP request method, "POST" or "GET"

getHTTPMethod

public java.lang.String getHTTPMethod()
Gets the HTTP request method.

Parameters:
HTTP - request method, "POST" or "GET"

setConnectionTimeout

public void setConnectionTimeout(int timeout)
Sets the timeout value, in milliseconds, to be used when fetching the map images from the external map provider.

Parameters:
timeout - an int that specifies the connection timeout value in milliseconds.
